resources.string: I need help! Please help me!

This mobile application is a partial requirement for 4th year students whose currently taking their Thesis II and System Analysis Design II subjects at Eulogio \"Amang\" Rodriguez Institute of Science and Technology.

Team Members: 
 	 Arevalo, Rosemarie B. 
 	 Collarga, Rhea Jane G. 
 	 Doromal, Kristine B. 
 	 Tiglao, Exequiel Justin R. 


Team Adviser: 
 	 Ms. Shiela Marie M. Matias

The main objective of the speech recognition is to devise a computer program that distinguishes between speakers. It will translate to our system that will help people so easily contact their relatives when an incident comes by saying just a word. The application will get the device\'s current location that will allow the user to inform the selected contact when the user is in danger. In this case, speech recognition has alternative way to send messages automatically when the user can\'t able to open or use their phone in different situations.
